basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ My name is Ajamu Page. Currently, I am the Educational Counselor/GED Instructor for the Plaquemines Parish Sheriff's Office.  I am also the owner of Page Technologies which is my personal IT service business.  Enrolling in Code Fellows was a no-brainer because it will help me service my clients in other ways.  The career change will also bring upon opportunities for me to possibly move on elsewhere and start a new beginning.

projects.title: Horned-Beast
projects.description: My first project created introducing React.  This project also introduced sort and filterBy.

projects.title: Pat's Coffee Shop
projects.description: An earlier school project created to show how to combine webpages into one website with hyperlinks.  This page features a front page for the shop, a product page, and a purchase page.

projects.title: Chocolate Pizza
projects.description: This was a project made with just .css.  We were to recreate a page called Chocolate Pizza but could only use .css.  I was able to make the page look as close to exact as the original.
